summary:
Software developer with 8+ years of experience in Lightbend Reactive Technology Stack(Scala ecosystem) and Typelevel stack. Enthusiastic about Function programming and domain-driven design. I am a certified Apache Spark Developer and Apache Cassandra developer, I always up to learn new technologies to solve challenging problems.

• Programming Languages: Scala, Java, Python

• Typelevel Libraries: Cats, Scalaz, Htt4s

• Big Data Technologies: Spark, Spark Streaming, Spark SQL, Spark ML, Map-reduce, HDFS, Cassandra, Apache Kafka, Data Modeling, Hive, Apache Ignite.

• NO SQL Database: Cassandra, MongoDB

• Cloud Platform: Amazon Web Services (EC2, Amazon S3), Databricks

• Monitoring and Reporting: Ganglia, Nagios

• Data:  Social Media, Next Generation Genomic Data

• Other: Quetzal(Semantic Web)


Open Source Contributions:

•  Apache Spark
•  Apache Carbondata
•  Apache Incubator IOTA
•  Scalafmt
